Let's use this thread to recommend games we've played and liked recently on textadventures.co.uk. 

I thought [url=http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/msipscxsdei7uykwt-qsxa/delphi:ef1n44hh]Delphi[/url:ef1n44hh] was neat, above average writing and interesting narration.

Posts.EditableText: Happy to hear any more suggestions for what should be an Editor's Pick! I've set Delphi as one for now.
Posts.HTML: Happy to hear any more suggestions for what should be an Editor's Pick! I've set Delphi as one for now.

Posts.EditableText: I really enjoyed[i:2hniuhlr] Broken Legs[/i:2hniuhlr] ([url:2hniuhlr]http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/akc9nskpk0_yjo8q5aldga/broken-legs[/url:2hniuhlr])  I had a hard time making much headway with the puzzles, but the excellent writing and wonderfully vicious and egocentric main character make it fun just to explore.
Posts.HTML: I really enjoyed Broken Legs (http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/akc9nskpk0_yjo8q5aldga/broken-legs) I had a hard time making much headway with the puzzles, but the excellent writing and wonderfully vicious and egocentric main character make it fun just to explore.
